Reviews.Title: Looooooove it
Reviews.Author: Aron Edwards
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this review from it. Nice size very easy to use. Gonna use it some more and report back.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: JAMES CAVENDER
Reviews.Content: My daughter says it's great and she has had no problem with the I-pad.  It was just what she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Mini Ipad
Reviews.Author: kingsley e aimufia
Reviews.Content: I love this product for it size and for the fact that could not even get this kind from Apple store.

Reviews.Title: I will keep the product but it was not the one I asked.
Reviews.Author: LILIAN CHACAR KHOURI
Reviews.Content: I received a different product, an iPad not a mini iPad. I'm from Venezuela and it is difficult for me to send it back. So I will sell this product here and see what I'm going to do. My country has exchange control and I used my electronic dollars for this year..so I have to wait for next year now.

Reviews.Title: Good reader
Reviews.Author: Jose Garcia
Reviews.Content: I gave it 4 stars only because I bought it with the 4G option and I do not need it.otherwise its great.
